c.t: 39.0106 Exclusion, Removal and Other Civil Penalties
c.sp: library|Turtle Mountain Band of Chippewa Indians Tribal Code|39|39.01|39.0106

c.x: First Offense (Tribal or Federal) – warning
Second Offense (Tribal or Federal) – three-year exclusion
Third or further Offense (Tribal or Federal) – lifetime exclusion
Indians Dealing, Transporting (or assisting in the transport of) and/or Sel
First Offense (Tribal or Federal) –three-year exclusion.
Second or further Offense (Tribal or Federal) – lifetime exclusion.
Non-Indians Dealing, Transporting (or assisting in the transport of) and/or
First Offense –Six Month Exclusion
Second Offense - One Year Exclusion
Third and subsequent Offenses – Five Year Exclusion for each offense
Other Non-Drug-Related Grounds for Removal of Non-Indians Only:
First Offense –One Year Exclusion
Second and subsequent Offense – One Year Exclusion to lifetime exclusion
Indians and/or Non-Indians Convicted of Repeated Sex Crimes:
First Offense (Tribal or Federal) –three-year exclusion.
Second or further Offense (Tribal or Federal) – lifetime exclusion.
